data.name: Epurery Plump
data.desc:
2 Level 2 monsters
Once per turn: You can target up to 2 Spells/Traps in any GY(s); attach them to this card as material. This is a Quick Effect if this card has "Purery Delicious Memory" as material. Thrice per turn, when you activate a "Purery" Quick-Play Spell Card (Quick Effect): You can attach that card on the field to this card as material, then you can banish 1 monster on the field until the End Phase.
